input.sentences: we were excited to be at riverfest !
we couldnt wait to enjoy some delicious grilled food .
the bands had begun and they were sounding great !
there is no way i was going to be going on this ride .
people were cooling off by jumping right in the lake !
output.sentences: Today I was excited to attend Riverfest.
There was a long line for the grilled food, but it was worth the wait.
A band started playing on the main stage and they sounded great.
After watching the band I decided to get on one of the carnival rides.
Finally, I ended the day by jumping into the lake with my friends.
